attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With products ranging from a Big Mac to a brand new car people in Britain are always being 'ripped off' compared to those on the continent and indeed across The Pond. Why should we pay almost 50% more on products such as an Ipod here than in America or several thousand pounds more on a car than we would on the continent. Seems to me the Government is taking the public for a ride...

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
